name: multiplex-imaging-analysis
description: Specific trigger conditions: (1) improving multiplex immunofluorescence segmentation or feature extraction, (2) optimizing SOM/FlowSOM clustering for cell phenotyping, (3) adding spatial analysis to imaging workflows, (4) integrating ECM features with cell compartment analysis. Verified on KINTSUGI v1.2.0 with InstanSeg, pyFlowSOM, scanpy, scimap.
